sentences.en: Faction almost broke up the club.
sentences.cn: 内部纠纷几乎使俱乐部解体.

sentences.en: Faction of theory of modern economy cycle is bristly, viewpoint each different.
sentences.cn: 现代经济周期理论派别林立, 观点各异.

sentences.en: I now understood clearly that I was caught between the king and the Bunam's faction.
sentences.cn: 我现在完全明白自己已陷入困境,在国王与布纳姆集团之间左右为难.

sentences.en: Many of these anxieties are expressed by the " realist faction ".
sentences.cn: 许多忧虑被表达成 “ 现实主义内讧 ”.

sentences.en: Offers vary between factions and between corporations within a faction.
sentences.cn: 提供的物品根据不同的势力和不同的军团而不同.

sentences.en: Relevant fighters and warships area which Citizens faction uses.
sentences.cn: 平民势力使用的相关战机战舰区.

sentences.cn: 海盗势力使用的相关战机战舰区.

sentences.cn: 独立集团势力使用的相关战机战舰区.

sentences.en: Some people abroad have been speculating about which faction I belong to.
sentences.cn: 国际上一些人在猜测我是哪一派.

sentences.en: struggles between the different factions within the party
The empire is the most human faction in the game.
sentences.cn: 帝国守卫军是游戏里的人类阵营.

sentences.en: the leaders of the warring factions
There are three separate single - player campaigns, one for each faction.
sentences.cn: 每个阵营都有各自的战役.

sentences.en: Therefore invites you to come the faction meeting together! Relaxesthe mood.
sentences.cn: 所以邀请你们一起来开个派会! 来放松心情.

sentences.en: They can even disguise themselves as a member of the opposite faction.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至可以将自己伪装成敌方的成员.

sentences.en: They were trying to from a faction behind the curtain.
sentences.cn: 他们暗地里在拉帮结派.

sentences.en: What is the max unit count population for each faction?
sentences.cn: 每个族的人口上限是多少?

words.tran_cn: 好捣乱的；好搞派系的；源于派别的

trans.tran_cn: 派别，派系斗争，内讧，纪实与虚构相结合的电影
trans.tran_en: a small group of people within a larger group, who have different ideas from the other members, and who try to get their own ideas accepted
